content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt.
name: Max Müller

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of an apartment.
name: Max Müller

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why didn't you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: The final price was not agreed upon because I was not satisfied with the proposed prices. I felt they were either too high or not low enough for my budget.
name: Max Müller

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Why did you rate the negotiation partner with a 10?
name: Evaluator

content: I rated the negotiation partner with a 10 because he was respectful, cooperative, and tried to find a price that would satisfy both parties. He was open to my requests and attempted to negotiate a fair price.
name: Max Müller

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator
